name: Vivian Hammond
description: Enigmatic tutor who uses puzzles to teach algebra, addiction recovery, and language. Lives alone in Hilly Dale. Subject of many subdivision stories.
key_relationships: tutored by: none; tutors: Cassie, Little Porn, Bruce, Rachel, many others
puzzle_connection: Uses ice-fishing puzzle as tutoring test. Leaves the hole piece missing deliberately.
notes: Stories about her: lived in show-house basement for a decade, camped in front yard tent, ran marathon backward.

name: Cassie
description: Tenth-grader struggling with algebra, sent to Vivian for tutoring. Narrator of the ice-fishing puzzle story.
key_relationships: friend: Rachel; tutor: Vivian; informant for: Cousins
first_appearance: Arriving at Vivian's house for first tutoring session
puzzle_connection: Spends an hour alone with the ice-fishing puzzle while Vivian sleeps. Names the fisherman 'Paul.'
notes: Discovers Little Porn's notebooks. Becomes key to understanding Vivian.

name: Little Porn
description: Child prodigy obsessed with patterns. Invented LPN (Little Porn's Nomenclature) for naming puzzle pieces. Parents were linguist missionaries.
key_relationships: friend: Vivian (childhood); rival: Quonxy; parents: linguist missionaries
puzzle_connection: Created complete puzzle-piece language mapping shapes to phonemes. Central figure in Tractatus Summer competition.
notes: Hated talking but loved naming. Completed Escher puzzle at age 4, then refused puzzles until Vivian.

name: Quonxy
description: Older woman who tutors children using puzzles. Invented CSQ (Cocksucker Quine Superscriptions). Became Little Porn's 'terrible enemy.'
key_relationships: rival: Little Porn; tutors: Simon (puzzle kid), Bill (addiction), many others
puzzle_connection: Created competing puzzle notation system. Uses puzzles to teach addiction resistance via 'Camel-Weasel-Whale' method.
notes: Poor, impatient with waste. May have had addictions herself.

name: Paul
description: The ice-fishing man in Vivian's puzzle. Not a real person—a figure Cassie names and talks to.
puzzle_connection: Sits on 8 pieces of the puzzle. The hole where his line drops is the missing piece.
notes: Wears mackinaw coat, has earflaps, beard, thermos of soup. Cassie's only companion during the strange tutoring session.

name: Rachel
description: Cassie's friend. Returned from Kuwait where family were missionaries. First child Vivian ever tutored.
key_relationships: friend: Cassie; tutor: Vivian; parents: missionaries
first_appearance: Referenced as Cassie's friend and Vivian's first student
puzzle_connection: Introduced Cassie to Vivian. Has 'reactor of intensity' from missionary upbringing.
notes: Blonde, five-six, sits alone at lunch with three empty spaces around her.

name: Cousins
description: Private investigator hired to find out why Hilly Dale produces so many smart kids. Works with Cassie.
puzzle_connection: Investigating the tutoring phenomenon. Reads Little Porn's notebooks with Cassie's help.
notes: Calls himself Cousins. Describes profession as 'consultant.' Hasn't filed taxes in years.

name: Bruce Stephenson
description: Thirty-something man who lives down the street. First adult Vivian tutors. Losing ability to speak.
first_appearance: The ice floes wash the puzzle fragment
puzzle_connection: Words get blocked at back of his throat. Vivian's puzzle methods may help.
notes: Not interested in putting feelings into words. Had been a bird watcher. Hobby: radio control cars.

name: Simon
description: The 'puzzle kid' — first child Quonxy taught using puzzle methods. Became 'smart as a whip' after.
puzzle_connection: First to work out puzzle language under Quonxy's guidance. Changed everything for the subdivision.
notes: Asked to write directions for an alien to put puzzle together. Took rest of summer and fall.

name: Bill
description: Man who drinks too much (coffee, soda, beer). Comes to Quonxy for addiction help.
puzzle_connection: Quonxy uses puzzle metaphors to teach addiction resistance.
notes: Heard Quonxy helped someone lose 30 pounds. Meets weekly. 68 ounces of coffee and bottle of wine per day.

name: Pastor Hitch
description: Pastor struggling with gambling addiction (sports betting). Comes to Vivian for help.
puzzle_connection: Taught the 'Camel-Weasel-Whale' method for flipping impulses.
notes: Spends sermon-writing time on sports stats. Doesn't actually enjoy gambling but can't stop.

name: Nelson Hammond
description: Vivian's father. Bird watcher who whittled walking sticks.
puzzle_connection: His father Jacob manufactured puzzles with curiously detailed surfaces.
notes: Lived on the land before subdivision was built.

name: Jacob Hammond
description: Vivian's grandfather. Managed printing press in St. Louis, manufactured jigsaw puzzles on the side.
puzzle_connection: Made puzzles with admixtures of natural forms and fonts/ciphers. Puzzles wouldn't come apart without tearing.
notes: His puzzles were beautiful but unusable as puzzles.

name: Gregory
description: Seven-year-old boy. Parents Robert and Stacy hired Vivian as tutor.
key_relationships: parents: Robert and Stacy; tutor: Vivian
puzzle_connection: Met Vivian in Walmart parking lot. Got all A's after one quarter with her.
notes: Likes black-haired women who smile at him.

name: Crank (Mr. Matthews)
description: Subdivision resident. Hobbyist linguist who wanted to be a missionary. Works in software.
puzzle_connection: Interested in private prayer language. Wrote paper on 'Private Prayer Language of Apostle Paul.'
notes: Got nickname from saying 'Give her a crank' about his lawn mower.
